content.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes the texture?

choices.label: The excerpt uses close spacing throughout.
The excerpt uses open spacing throughout.
The excerpt uses open spacing at the beginning and close spacing at the end.
The excerpt uses close spacing at the beginning and open spacing at the end.

content.answer: The excerpt uses close spacing at the beginning and open spacing at the end.

unit.text: 2: Music Fundamentals II - Minor Scales and Key Signatures, Melody, Timbre, and Texture

skill.text: Skill 2.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in notated music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
